content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Iron Chest at position (-16.5, -48.5) and Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-10.5, -49.5) and (-11.5, -49.5)
- Iron Chest at position (-13.5, -49.5)

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), (45.5, -80.5), (47.5, -80.5), and (49.5, -80.5)
- Burner Inserters at positions (43.5, -80.5) and (41.5, -78.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when supplying iron ore to furnaces
- Ensure that there is sufficient iron ore in your inventory before attempting to supply furnaces.

### Errors when inserter drop positions are blocked
- Regularly clear blockages at inserter drop positions to prevent operational delays.

### Errors when chests at drop positions are full
- Monitor and empty chests at drop positions to maintain continuous mining and production operations.
